message:
Compilation errors, please fix and try again.

scrambler.c: In function ‘main’:
scrambler.c:16:20: error: ‘ptr’ undeclared (first use in this function)
   16 |         ch = fgetc(ptr);
      |                    ^~~
scrambler.c:16:20: note: each undeclared identifier is reported only once for each function it appears in
